bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Liquid-Immersed Transformers Through-Fault-Current Duration
IEEE Guide for Liquid-Immersed Transformers Through-Fault-Current Duration

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Recommendations believed essential for the application of over current protective devices applied to limit the exposure time of transformers to short-circuit current are set forth. Transformer coordination curves are presented for four categories of transformers. There is no intent to imply overload capability

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C57.109-2018 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.109-1993)
